description: The strength of your strike is not up to the challange.
Strike lands with little result. You had better get serious soon.
The beast is made of stronger stuff than you hoped.
Strike glances off foe and damages his surroundings.
Solid, but nowhere near a vital spot. Bruise foe's calf muscle.
Blow is placed solidly against foe's side. His vitals are beyond reach.
Strike threatens foe's eyes and he flinches. You have initiative.
You find a weak point. Unexpectedly, foe reels and falls down. His shoulder is shattered. He gets up slowly.
Although not deadly, this strike leaves a visible and encouraging wound. You may win yet.
Blow to foe's upper arm. Discoloration and various bruises mark your success.
Your strike hit no vitals, but you can hear the ribs in foe's side crackle. Foe fights on in some pain.
Heavy and hard. Your strike is effective. Foe's abdomen is damaged.
Your onslaught lands against foe's skull. Brain is damaged. Swelling fractures his skull. Foe drops and dies in 6 rounds.
Violent strike to foe's face. His eyes are badly damaged. He is blinded. He falls over. You have him now.
Titanic blast sends foe stumbling despite his bulk. He is unable to defend himself for a moment.
Side strike. Foe steps to the side and takes the damage in his ribs. Bones are broken.
Mighty is your strike. Its your turn to give. Foe's chest tears open and blood sprays on all bystanders.
Snap foe's head back and fracture his spine. Foe is paralyzed from the neck down.
Shatter parts of foe's skeleton. Heart and lungs are damaged. Foe falls dead. His blood pours out onto the floor.
You warn foe of his doom with this tiny whisper of your power.
Foe evades much of the damage. Maybe next time.
Your blast scrapes along foe's shoulder hissing as it touches his skin.
Your strike is solid and flat, foe is burned by the enchantment.
Heavy assault yields a measure of damage to foe's leg.
Strike tears down foe's back. He ducts down in pain.
Blast to foe's face. Most of the damage misses him. Some does not.
Collapse foe's chest with perfect placement. His lungs are destroyed and his heart stops. He dies after 6 rounds of wheezing.
Assault bounces off foe's primary arm. Arm is damaged but still functioning. Try again.
Solid strike to the chest. Foe steps back 10 feet and rebounds.
Sparks fly and smoke rises off foe as your assault impacts.
Your attack lands with a beautiful crash. Foe's leg is heavily damaged. He struggles to keeps his defense up.
Shot lands against foe's chest. Strike infests foe with terminal poison. The full burden of the enchantment ends his life instantly.
Blast to foe's head. Inner ear destroyed. Foe dies in 6 inactive rounds.
Foe stumbles 10 feet to his right with the impact of your attack. He is vulnerable.
Blast breaks bones and causes bleeding in foe's leg. He can still operate.
Epic assault to foe's side sends foe onto his back. Wounds are severe. Internal bleeding. He is in trouble.
Hammer foe's neck and face. The energy engulfs his throat. Nerves are destroyed. Foe dies after 9 inactive rounds.
Blast goes in through foe's eye and comes out ugly. Foe dies instantly. His terrible bulk comes crashing down.
